dc:title: Fall Appeal - 1973
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal to readers to sustain the Catholic Worker in a time of need. Also a message of thanks for the assistance and love given in the past.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 535 1973-10-02 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
